value.title: Gaming Platform Razer Tackles Ocean Waste With AI Robot Tech

value.title: Robots Can Make Music, but Can They Sing?
value.excerpt: At an international competition called the A.I. Song Contest, tracks exploring the technology as a tool for music making revealed the potential — and the limitations.

value.title: The Pizza Delivery Guy Will Be a Robot at Many Campuses This Fall
value.excerpt: Russia’s Yandex will build the service’s rovers, as delivery companies turn to automation to cut costs in an industry boosted by the pandemic.

value.title: Abundant Robotics shuts down fruit harvesting business
value.excerpt: Abundant Robotics, which was developing a robot to pick apples, closed its business after spinning out of SRI International in 2016.

value.title: Sometimes interacting with robots is easier than with humans
value.excerpt: A new study shows higher performance in idea generation when humans believe they're interacting with a bot. Is working with robots in our future?

value.title: What's a robot manicure really like? Quick, cheap, and guilt-inducing.
value.excerpt: A robot gave me a manicure last week. Let me stop you before you envision a bipedal humanoid carefully dipping a brush into a bottle and lacquering my nails. Instead, the experience felt more like inserting my hand into a 3D printer.

value.title: AI-Driven Robots Are Here For Good
value.excerpt: AI, algorithms and technological applications are accelerating into new realms. With the proper implementation of ethics, diversity, and inclusive design - humans stand to benefit significantly.

value.title: Lidar is the gold standard of robot vacuum navigation, but it’s not perfect
value.excerpt: Today's robot vacuums offer intelligent navigation courtesy of lidar tech. But despite being the gold standard of robot vacuum navigation, it's not perfect.

value.title: A Robot That Finds Your Lost Stuff and More AI-Enabled Gadgets to Come
value.excerpt: Researchers are working on a wave of sophisticated devices for the home, from toilets that screen for viruses to a ‘Roomba on steroids’ that might detect your TV remote in the couch.

value.title: Zebra (ZBRA) to Buy Fetch Robotics, Enhance Product Offerings
value.excerpt: Zebra Technologies Corporation ZBRA recently announced its intention to buy Fetch Robotics, Inc., a leading developer of autonomous mobile robots (AMRs) for $290 million. It’s worth noting that Zebra already owns 5% of Fetch Robotics and the latest announcement is related to the acquisition of the remaining 95% of the company.

value.title: ‘Are you thirsty?’ This AI-enabled robot can bring beer to holiday parties
value.excerpt: Heineken says its autonomous robot can hold up to 12 cans of beer, will follow you down the sidewalk and has a friendly AI personality.

value.title: Amazon plans to build delivery robot tech in Finland
value.excerpt: Amazon announced Thursday that it plans to develop new technology for its autonomous delivery vehicles in Helsinki, Finland.

value.title: After an $8.4M raise, strawberry-picking robotics startup Traptic begins commercial deployment
value.excerpt: We first covered Traptic back in 2019, when it appeared as a Battlefield finalist on stage at Disrupt SF. Today, the South Bay robotics startup is announcing some major progress. For starters, it began commercial deployment of its strawberry-picking mobile robot early this month.

value.title: Zebra Technologies to Acquire Fetch Robotics
value.excerpt: Zebra Technologies (NASDAQ: ZBRA), an innovator at the front line of business with solutions and partners that deliver a performance edge, today announced it intends to acquire Fetch Robotics, a pioneer in on-demand automation.

value.title: Food Supply Chain: Tyson Foods Invests in AI Robotics
value.excerpt: Tyson Foods - among others - invests in Soft Robotics Series B extension, expanding the use of AI, robotics and automation in the food supply chain

value.title: Nice publishes ethical framework for applying AI to customer service
value.excerpt: Robotic process automation firm Nice published an ethical framework for applying AI and RPA to customer support functions.
